name: MEC Stratosphere Bottoms - Youths
description:
These warm, lightweight fleece tights can be worn on their own or as a base layer through the winter. The fabric moves moisture, so it's comfortable through a range of activities and assorted atmospheric conditions.Made from soft, moisture-wicking polyester fleece.Flat-locked seams eliminate friction.Simple pull-on elastic waist.Coordinates with MEC Stratosphere Crew.

        Sustainability
